Class oracle.html.Image

Class oracle.html.Image 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.Image
public class Image
extends Item
implements IVAlign
Description:

Class Image encapsulates an IMG element in HTML2

Instructions:

Use this class whenver you want to include an image or a server-side image map in your dynamic HTML page.

Example:

// Create an image Image img = new Image("res/home_icon.gif"); // Create an ImageMap Image img = new Image("res/home_map.gif", "This is an image map", IVAlign.TOP, true); 






    
 See Also:
    
 Item, ImageMap, ImageMapArea







  




  
 
	Image(String, String, int, boolean, String)
  
 Creates an Image Object

 Creates an Image Object

 Creates an Image Object

Implementation Note: Objct should be both 
browser-independent and browser-aware

Image

  public Image(String imgURI,
               String altTxt,
               int align,
               boolean ismap,
               String usemap)




  
 Creates an Image Object
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 imgURI - the URI for the image file
    
 altTxt - alternative text to be displayed if user agent cannot display the image
    
 align - alignment of the image
    
 ismap - specifies whether this is an ImageMap
    
 usemap - specifies whether client side ImageMap is used
  




Image

  public Image(String imgURI,
               String altTxt,
               int align,
               boolean ismap)




  
 Creates an Image Object
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 imgURI - the URI for the image file
    
 altTxt - alternative text to be displayed if user agent cannot display the image
    
 align - alignment of the image
    
 ismap - specifies whether this is an ImageMap
